title: Star System
description: Configuration for a specific star system

canEnterViaWarpDrive.description: Whether this system can be warped to via the warp drive

startHere.description: Set to true if you want to spawn here after dying, not Timber Hearth. You can still warp back to the main star system.

factRequiredForWarp.description: Set to the FactID that must be revealed before it can be warped to. Don't set `CanEnterViaWarpDrive` to false if you're using this, that would make no sense.

destroyStockPlanets.description: Do you want a clean slate for this star system? Or will it be a modified version of the original.

enableTimeLoop.description: Should the player be sent back in time after 22 minutes?

skybox.description: Options for the skybox of your system

destroyStarField.description: Whether to destroy the star field around the player (always set to true if `assetBundle` and `path` is set)

assetBundle.description: Path to the Unity asset bundle to load the skybox material from

path.description: Path to the material within the asset bundle specified by `assetBundle` to use for the skybox
